name: Race Game (Bear)
description:
My third school project: A racing game.

This racing game has a shop for upgrades , achievements , powerups and a lot more

Controls:

WASD = move

E = powerup

Dev Mode: 

M for 100 coins

Hold N for a lot of coins

E for a random powerup in a race

Backspace to get sent to the next checkpoint

C to be sent to the Blender map

X to be sent to the main menu
